summary: THE HEADLIGHTS ON THIS VEHICLE ARE DANGEROUSLY DIM.  I HAVE SPOKEN TO NUMEROUS OWNERS WHO SUGGESTED THE SAME ISSUE.  THE DEALERSHIPS WANT TO CHARGE OVER $2000.00 TO CORRECT THIS AND IT IS NOT CLEAR THAT REPLACING THESE LIGHTS WITH THE SAME LIGHTS WILL REPAIR THE ISSUE.  THIS NEEDS GOVERNMENT ACTION OR PEOPLE WILL GET HURT.
